get.description: Returns all of the available entities from Digital Measures

200.description: Service request is OK and the list of entities is in the response
Service request is OK and the created authorized client in the response

get.description: Returns all the authorized clients and their authorizations

200.description: Service request is OK and the list of authorized clients is in the response

Content-Disposition.description: inline; filename="{name of the uploaded file}"

200.description: Service request is OK and the authorized client is in the response
Service request is OK and the authorized client is in the response

get.description: Returns all data for the specified faculty member

200.description: Service request is OK and the faculty member data is in the response body.

204.description: Service request is OK and no data is available.

get.description: Returns all of the PCI information for faculty

200.description: Service request is OK and the list of faculty information is in the response
